::Battera::

She transformed into bat mode and flew down the hall after him.  She 
smiled, this was the first time she had had fun while being on the 
ship.  She beat her wings and came up just behind him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> Battera's response made him very happy. He looked at
> Battera and said to her playfully, "Race ya!!" With
> that he transformed to beast mode (a condor) and flew
> down the hallway.
